MAN.TITLE: test2n
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Tests and confidence intervals based on two normal samples with common variance

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : confidence level for the confidence intervals (default 0.95).
: probability that Student statistic based on x and y is as far from 0 as it is actually, or further away under hypothesis that theoretical means are equal.
: confidence interval for the difference of means.
: confidence interval for the standard deviation. (Confidence intervals of the form [LeftLimit, PointEstimate, RightLimit]).

DESCRIPTION.P: Tests and confidence intervals based on two normal samples with common variance.
